New Records: This is India's first match under new coach Manolo Marquez in the Intercontinental Cup 2024.
The match is being held at Gachibowli Stadium in Hyderabad, which has not hosted an India match in 16 years.
Key Match Events: India were held to a goalless draw in their previous match against Mauritius, highlighting their struggles in the final third.
Syria's striker Mawas is in excellent form and will be a key challenge for India's defense.
Pre-Game Insights: Manolo Marquez is expected to employ a defensive strategy, potentially moving Anirudh Thapa to an attacking role.
Syria is seen as a well-drilled and experienced team, while India is in a transitional phase under their new coach.
Post-Match Reflections: A win for India would be a significant step forward for the team and their new coach.
The match is viewed as a turning point for India's confidence and performance under Marquez.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a crucial one for both teams in the context of the Intercontinental Cup 2024.
The game will be live-streamed in India on Jio Cinema and Sports18.
Others: Syria has a strong head-to-head record against India, with previous encounters showing competitive matches.
